name: Perfect Scrambled Eggs
description: Creamy, fluffy scrambled eggs in under 5 minutes
instructions: Crack eggs into a bowl and add milk. Whisk until well combined.
Heat a non-stick pan over medium-low heat and add butter.
Once butter melts and foams, pour in egg mixture.
Let sit for 20 seconds, then gently stir with a spatula.
Continue stirring every 30 seconds until eggs are just set but still creamy.
Remove from heat, season with salt and pepper, and serve immediately.

name: Quick Fried Rice
description: Use leftover rice for this fast and satisfying meal
ingredients: Optional: cooked chicken, shrimp, or tofu
instructions: Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a large wok or pan over high heat.
Scramble the eggs in the pan, then remove and set aside.
Add remaining oil, then stir-fry onion and garlic for 1 minute.
Add frozen vegetables and cook for 2-3 minutes.
Add rice, breaking up any clumps with your spatula.
Stir-fry for 3-4 minutes until rice is heated through.
Add soy sauce and scrambled eggs, toss everything together.
Cook for 1 more minute, then serve hot.

name: Simple Pasta Marinara
description: Classic Italian comfort food ready in 20 minutes
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil. Cook pasta according to package directions.
While pasta cooks, heat olive oil in a large pan over medium heat.
Add minced garlic and sauté for 1 minute until fragrant (don't burn!).
Pour in crushed tomatoes and add dried basil and oregano.
Season with salt and pepper, then simmer for 10 minutes.
Drain pasta, reserving 1 cup of pasta water.
Add pasta to sauce, tossing to coat. Add pasta water if needed to thin sauce.
Serve topped with fresh basil and parmesan if desired.

name: Easy Chicken Stir-Fry
description: Healthy, colorful stir-fry packed with vegetables
instructions: Mix chicken with 1 tablespoon soy sauce and cornstarch. Let marinate 5 minutes.
Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a wok over high heat.
Add chicken and stir-fry for 4-5 minutes until cooked through. Remove and set aside.
Add remaining oil to wok. Add garlic and ginger, stir-fry for 30 seconds.
Add all vegetables and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes until crisp-tender.
Return chicken to wok. Add remaining soy sauce and oyster sauce.
Toss everything together for 1-2 minutes.
Serve immediately over hot rice.

name: Fresh Greek Salad
description: Light, refreshing salad with Mediterranean flavors
instructions: Cut all vegetables into bite-sized pieces and place in a large bowl.
Add olives and feta cheese.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, vinegar, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Pour dressing over salad and toss gently to combine.
Let sit for 5 minutes for flavors to meld.
Serve immediately or refrigerate for up to 2 hours.

name: 3-Ingredient Banana Pancakes
description: Healthy pancakes with just banana, eggs, and oats
instructions: Mash bananas in a bowl until smooth.
Add eggs and oats, mix until well combined (batter will be thin).
Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat and add a small amount of butter.
Pour 1/4 cup batter for each pancake.
Cook for 2-3 minutes until bubbles form and edges look set.
Flip carefully and cook for another 1-2 minutes.
Serve warm with your favorite toppings.

name: Veggie Quesadilla
description: Crispy, cheesy quesadilla loaded with vegetables
ingredients: 2 cups shredded cheese (cheddar or Mexican blend)
Optional: sour cream, salsa, guacamole for serving
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat.
Sauté bell pepper and onion for 3-4 minutes until soft.
Add corn and black beans, cook for 2 more minutes. Remove from heat.
Heat a clean pan or griddle over medium heat.
Place one tortilla on the pan, sprinkle with cheese.
Add a layer of vegetable mixture, then more cheese.
Top with another tortilla and cook for 2-3 minutes per side until golden and crispy.
Cut into wedges and serve with sour cream, salsa, or guacamole.

name: Classic Caprese Salad
description: Simple Italian salad with tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil
instructions: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella into 1/4-inch thick rounds.
Arrange tomato and mozzarella slices on a platter, alternating and overlapping.
Tuck fresh basil leaves between the slices.
Drizzle olive oil and balsamic vinegar over the salad.
Season with salt and freshly ground black pepper.
Serve immediately at room temperature for best flavor.

name: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Creamy Italian pasta with bacon, eggs, and parmesan
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil. Cook spaghetti according to package directions.
While pasta cooks, fry bacon in a large pan over medium heat until crispy (5-7 minutes).
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, parmesan, and lots of black pepper.
When pasta is done, reserve 1 cup pasta water, then drain.
Add hot pasta to the pan with bacon (off heat). Toss to coat.
Quickly pour in egg mixture while tossing constantly. The heat will cook the eggs into a creamy sauce.
Add pasta water a little at a time if sauce is too thick.
Serve immediately with extra parmesan and black pepper.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: Simple Italian pizza with tomato, mozzarella, and basil
instructions: Preheat oven to 475°F (245°C). If you have a pizza stone, put it in to heat.
Roll out pizza dough on a floured surface to about 12 inches diameter.
Transfer to a pizza pan or parchment paper.
Spread tomato sauce evenly, leaving a 1-inch border for crust.
Arrange mozzarella slices on top. Drizzle with olive oil.
Season with salt and pepper.
Bake for 10-12 minutes until crust is golden and cheese is bubbly.
Remove from oven, top with fresh basil leaves.
Let cool for 2 minutes, slice, and serve.

name: Easy Pad Thai
description: Thai stir-fried noodles with shrimp, peanuts, and lime
ingredients: 2 tablespoons tamarind paste or lime juice
instructions: Soak rice noodles in warm water for 20 minutes until soft. Drain.
Mix fish sauce, tamarind paste, and brown sugar in a small bowl.
Heat 2 tablespoons oil in a wok over high heat.
Add shrimp and cook for 2-3 minutes until pink. Remove and set aside.
Add remaining oil and garlic, stir-fry for 30 seconds.
Push to side, crack eggs into wok and scramble.
Add drained noodles and sauce mixture. Toss for 2-3 minutes.
Add shrimp back in, plus bean sprouts and green onions. Toss for 1 minute.
Serve topped with crushed peanuts and lime wedges.

name: Teriyaki Chicken Bowl
description: Sweet and savory Japanese chicken over rice with vegetables
ingredients: 500g chicken thighs, cut into bite-sized pieces
instructions: Mix soy sauce, honey, vinegar, sesame oil, garlic, and ginger in a bowl.
Heat vegetable oil in a large pan over medium-high heat.
Add chicken and cook for 5-7 minutes until golden and cooked through.
While chicken cooks, steam broccoli for 3-4 minutes until tender-crisp.
Pour teriyaki sauce over chicken. Let simmer for 2 minutes.
Mix cornstarch with 2 tablespoons water, add to pan to thicken sauce.
Serve chicken and sauce over rice with steamed broccoli.
Garnish with sesame seeds.

name: Quick Chicken Tacos
description: Flavorful chicken tacos with fresh toppings
instructions: Mix chili powder, cumin, paprika, garlic powder, salt, and pepper in a bowl.
Toss chicken pieces with spice mixture until well coated.
Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add chicken and cook for 8-10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until cooked through.
Warm tortillas in a dry pan or microwave for 20 seconds.
Fill each tortilla with chicken.
Top with lettuce, tomato, cheese, and sour cream.
Serve with lime wedges on the side.

name: Fresh Guacamole
description: Creamy avocado dip with lime and cilantro
instructions: Cut avocados in half, remove pit, and scoop flesh into a bowl.
Mash avocados with a fork to desired consistency (chunky or smooth).
Add lime juice immediately to prevent browning.
Stir in onion, tomato, cilantro, garlic, salt, and cumin.
Mix well and taste. Adjust seasoning if needed.
Serve immediately with tortilla chips.
To store: press plastic wrap directly on surface to prevent browning.

name: Classic French Toast
description: Golden, crispy French toast perfect for weekend brunch
ingredients: 8 slices bread (brioche or thick white bread)
instructions: In a shallow bowl, whisk together eggs, milk, vanilla, and cinnamon.
Heat a large skillet or griddle over medium heat. Add 1 tablespoon butter.
Dip each bread slice into egg mixture, coating both sides but not soaking too long.
Place coated bread on hot skillet. Cook for 2-3 minutes per side until golden brown.
Add more butter as needed for remaining slices.
Serve hot with maple syrup, powdered sugar, and fresh berries if desired.

name: Avocado Toast
description: Trendy and nutritious breakfast with mashed avocado on toast
instructions: Toast bread slices until golden and crispy.
While bread toasts, mash avocados in a bowl with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread mashed avocado generously on each toast.
Top with cherry tomatoes, red pepper flakes, or everything bagel seasoning.
Optional: top with a fried or poached egg for extra protein.
Serve immediately while toast is still warm.

name: Creamy Tomato Soup
description: Comforting homemade tomato soup, perfect with grilled cheese
instructions: Melt butter in a large pot over medium heat.
Add onion and cook for 5 minutes until soft. Add garlic and cook 1 more minute.
Pour in crushed tomatoes and vegetable broth.
Add sugar, dried basil, salt, and pepper. Stir well.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes.
Use an immersion blender to puree soup until smooth (or transfer to blender in batches).
Stir in heavy cream and heat through (don't boil).
Serve hot, garnished with fresh basil.

name: Classic Chicken Noodle Soup
description: Healing soup with tender chicken, vegetables, and noodles
instructions: Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.
Add onion, carrots, and celery. Cook for 5 minutes until softened.
Add garlic and cook for 1 more minute.
Pour in chicken broth. Add chicken breasts, bay leaf, and thyme.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes.
Remove chicken, shred with two forks, and return to pot.
Add noodles and cook for 8-10 minutes until tender.
Season with salt and pepper. Remove bay leaf.
Serve hot, garnished with fresh parsley.

name: Microwave Chocolate Mug Cake
description: Single-serving chocolate cake ready in 2 minutes
ingredients: Optional: chocolate chips, ice cream for serving
instructions: In a large microwave-safe mug, mix flour, sugar, cocoa powder, and salt.
Add egg and mix well with a fork until smooth.
Stir in milk, oil, and vanilla extract until fully combined.
Optional: add a few chocolate chips on top.
Microwave on high for 1 minute 30 seconds to 2 minutes (time varies by microwave).
Cake should rise and be set in the center. If still wet, microwave for 15 more seconds.
Let cool for 1 minute before eating.
Serve with ice cream or whipped cream if desired.

name: Classic Scrambled Eggs
description: A delicious American recipe with eggs, butter, milk and more. Ready in 5 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: eggs, butter, milk, salt, pepper.
Pour eggs and stir gently.
Cook until just set.
Season and serve.
Serve immediately. Serves 2.

name: Fluffy Pancakes
description: A delicious American recipe with flour, milk, eggs and more. Ready in 15 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: flour, milk, eggs, sugar, baking powder.
Mix dry ingredients.
Whisk wet ingredients separately.
Combine wet and dry gently.
Heat griddle with butter.
Pour batter and cook until bubbles form.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Avocado Toast
description: A delicious Modern recipe with bread, avocado, lemon juice and more. Ready in 3 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: bread, avocado, lemon juice, salt, pepper.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve immediately. Serves 1.

name: Overnight Oats
description: A delicious International recipe with rolled oats, milk, yogurt and more. Ready in 0 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: rolled oats, milk, yogurt, honey, berries.
Mix oats, milk, and yogurt.
Add chia seeds and honey.
Serve immediately. Serves 1.

name: French Toast
description: A delicious French recipe with bread, eggs, milk and more. Ready in 10 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: bread, eggs, milk, cinnamon, vanilla extract.
Dip bread slices in egg mixture.
Cook bread until golden on both sides.
Serve with maple syrup.
Serve immediately. Serves 2.

name: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
description: A delicious Italian recipe with spaghetti, garlic, olive oil and more. Ready in 15 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: spaghetti, garlic, olive oil, red pepper flakes, parsley.
Cook spaghetti until al dente.
Sauté minced garlic in olive oil.
Add red pepper flakes.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Chicken Stir Fry
description: A delicious Asian recipe with chicken breast, soy sauce, vegetables and more. Ready in 15 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: chicken breast, soy sauce, vegetables, garlic, ginger.
Slice chicken into strips.
Stir fry chicken in sesame oil.
Add minced garlic and ginger.
Pour soy sauce and cook until vegetables tender.
Serve over rice.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
description: A delicious American recipe with bread, cheese, butter and more. Ready in 5 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: bread, cheese, butter.
Butter outside of bread slices.
Place cheese between slices.
Flip and cook other side.
Serve hot.
Serve immediately. Serves 1.

name: Caesar Salad
description: A delicious Italian recipe with romaine lettuce, caesar dressing, parmesan cheese and more. Ready in 0 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: romaine lettuce, caesar dressing, parmesan cheese, croutons, lemon.
Wash and chop romaine.
Add croutons.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Tacos
description: A delicious Mexican recipe with ground beef, taco seasoning, tortillas and more. Ready in 15 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: ground beef, taco seasoning, tortillas, lettuce, tomato.
Add taco seasoning and water.
Simmer until thickened.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.
